name: 3Demons
description:
A remake of a great game from 1983, 3Demon, made in a new horror-themed look. Built with Raycast Game Maker.

You are trapped in a black and blue maze and you need to escape, avoid ghosts and try to beat the game.

Use WASD to move, Mouse or arrows to look around (it is a raycast game, so only left/right), use Space to open doors.
